channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024040548
item.description:
Report X-2024040548

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-18T18:14:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being unloaded the package handler noticed a white residue coming out of the bottom. DescribePack: A large crack on the side of the drum DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Once the package was discovered the box was set inside a hazmat tote, taken to the damage hazmat cage, and set under the vent

item.title: Report X-2024040492
item.description:
Report X-2024040492

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-18T18:14:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-02
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was noticed to be leaking on the bottom of the box, box was then brought to QA for further inspection. DescribePack: Bottles had partially unscrewed caps allowing some of its contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed inside a lined tote to mitigate the effects of the release.

item.title: Report X-2024040445
item.description:
Report X-2024040445

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-17T15:16:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-01
  • City: REDMOND
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: It was being loaded onto a van when it was noticed that the box was wet in many places. DescribePack: Left side of box had the degreaser on it, the top of the box was saturated with the degreaser and the right side of the box had degreaser on it. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The shipping box was put into a plastic hazmat bag and tote and brought to the hazmat cage and put under the fan.

item.title: Report X-2024040393
item.description:
Report X-2024040393

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-29
  • City: AUBURN
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered slightly stained and was brought to QA for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspection one of the bottles of ConvClean Forte had a loose cap allowing its contents to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed inside a lined tote and isolated from other package.

item.title: Report X-2024040350
item.description:
Report X-2024040350

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-29
  • City: TACOMA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: As the package was being moved on the rollers from unload it fell off the rollers landing on a bolt puncturing the bottom of the pail. DescribePack: A bolt punctured the bottom of the pail. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: As soon as the incident happened the pail was placed inside a hazmat tote, taken to the damaged hazmat cage, and set under the vent.

item.title: Report X-2024040188
item.description:
Report X-2024040188

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-12T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: FIBREBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WERE PUT ON AND FIBREBOARD BOX WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. FIBREBOARD BOX WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND FIBREBOARD BOX WAS THEN ENTERED INTO ETT.
